content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18, -53)

- Collection chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)

### Science Pack Production Setup at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt system for material transport

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe systems for water and steam transport
- Electricity network connecting multiple entities

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Collection chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Before attempting to extract items, verify that they exist in the target container
- Check storage chest inventories before extraction attempts

### Errors with fuel management
- Maintain coal supplies for burner devices
- Check fuel levels before attempting to insert fuel
- Keep a reserve of coal in inventory for refueling operations

### Production line issues
- Ensure all components of production chains are properly fueled and connected
- Monitor input/output chest positions and connections
- Verify correct placement and alignment of inserters with their target entities

### Resource shortages
- Monitor and maintain adequate supplies of raw materials
- Ensure mining operations are continuously fueled and operational
- Keep production chains supplied with necessary ingredients

### Assembly machine operation
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor input chest contents to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure proper inserter placement for ingredient delivery
